title: Ore to Kawazu-san no Isekai Hourouki - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Demi-Humans   Dragons   Dwarfs   Elves   Fairies   Heroes   Kingdoms   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Sword And Magic   Transported to Another World
author: Kuzumochi   くずもち
description: Tarou was just an ordinary university student until a strange old magician summoned him to another world. Upon learning that his newly acquired magical power is 8 million (8 million more powerful than an average magician), he uses his abnormally powerful magic to revive the old man that caused all this… in the form of a frog. Thus begin the strange adventures of a boy with ridiculous magical power and Kawazu, the former strongest magician, now revived as a frog.>
